title: Rajat Sharma on ITC & Bajaj Finance and why he won’t invest in LIC IPO - Economic Times
content: Rajat Sharma on ITC & Bajaj Finance and why he won’t invest in LIC IPO  Economic Times
description: “One of the things we are doing and advising clients to do is to look for stocks where dividend yields are really high. Buy them and do not worry if the stock prices fall. They will come back.   I find Infosys a tad expensive at this price but I am not going to sell. If you are beginning to build a portfolio, this is a fundamentally strong stock which you should add to your portfolio. On the other hand, Bajaj Finance is an avoid”
